column5: unknown assailants attacked an elderly couple in their home
column6: injuring the wife and killing her husband in Boeung Bop
column7: Pursat Province.------The victims were an 83 year old man and his wife
column9: the cops visited the scene. The motive is believed to be because the victim has been accused of practicing ------sorcery------. ------Police have now begun a murder investigation.
